K12D0703_H0672:37a-1: a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya sim ha n'a da n'a ma dh'a ra ni /
K12D0703_H0672:37a-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sengge sgra'i gzungs zhes bya ba /
K12D0703_H0672:37a-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:37a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12D0703_H0672:37b-0: bcom @37b ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0703_H0672:37b-1: phyug gi pho brang ri bo ta la'i rtse mo
K12D0703_H0672:37b-2: na rin po che'i khang bzang rin po che dang
K12D0703_H0672:37b-4: nor bu dpag med kyis spras pa /
K12D0703_H0672:37b-6: me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis kun nas
K12D0703_H0672:37b-7: brgyan pa'i sa phyogs de na byams pa la sogs
K12D0703_H0672:37b-8: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang
K12D0703_H0672:37b-9: / nyan thos chen po sh'a ra dva ti'i bu
K12D0703_H0672:37b-10: la sogs pa dge slong rab tu mang pos yongs
K12D0703_H0672:37b-11: / su bskor zhing / bcom ldan 'das sengge'i gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K12D0703_H0672:37b-12: 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0703_H0672:37b-13: 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur
K12D0703_H0672:37b-14: pa de rang gi stan las langs te bla gos
K12D0703_H0672:37b-15: phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i
K12D0703_H0672:37b-16: lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
K12D0703_H0672:37b-17: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das
K12D0703_H0672:37b-20: yul ma ga dha na rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi ba 'khor dang /
K12D0703_H0672:37b-22: longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa las /
K12D0703_H0672:37b-25: dbugs mi bde ba snying nad 'bar ba byung ste /
K12D0703_H0672:38a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0703_H0672:38a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal /
K12D0703_H0672:38a-4: sngon 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na 'jam dpal
K12D0703_H0672:38a-5: khyed nyid byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po
K12D0703_H0672:38a-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sengge sgra 'di
K12D0703_H0672:38a-8: nyid byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i mchog ces bya
K12D0703_H0672:38a-9: ba yin pas / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis
K12D0703_H0672:38a-10: stong gsum du sems can gyi don la gshegs pa
K12D0703_H0672:38a-11: la sengge dkar po gcig dbang du bsdus te chibs
K12D0703_H0672:38a-12: ba yin pas / pa byas / sku la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan /
K12D0703_H0672:38a-16: autpa la thogs nas phyin pa la rgya mtsho chen
K12D0703_H0672:38a-17: po la rgal ba'i dus su sengge bzhag nas 'khur
K12D0703_H0672:38a-18: res byas shing byon pa la; byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0703_H0672:38a-19: shes rab chen po khyod nyid ni /
K12D0703_H0672:38a-20: grogs la phan pa'i sems kyis rang gi ral gris rang bkum mo //
K12D0703_H0672:38a-21: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog gi bsam pa la steng 'og bar snang gi klu dang /
K12D0703_H0672:38a-22: lha la sogs pas bsad dam snyam nas btung ba'i
K12D0703_H0672:38b-0: snod bram ze'i thod pa lag na thogs @38b tri
K12D0703_H0672:38b-1: sh'u la rtse gsum pa lag na thogs /
K12D0703_H0672:38b-3: mya ngan du ral pa thod du bcings nas steng gi lha la bsdigs te /
K12D0703_H0672:38b-4: snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas //
K12D0703_H0672:38b-5: rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus //
K12D0703_H0672:38b-6: lha rnams kun gyis nyes na chad pa'i las //
K12D0703_H0672:38b-7: grong khyer 'joms shing lha rnams 'gum par bgyid //
K12D0703_H0672:38b-8: ces smras te lha rnams la tri sh'u la gdengs pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:38b-9: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12D0703_H0672:38b-10: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K12D0703_H0672:38b-11: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:38b-12: khams gsum gyi lha dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste lha'i me tog padma dang /
K12D0703_H0672:38b-15: tsam pa ka la sogs pa phul te thod pa bkang ngo /
K12D0703_H0672:38b-16: de nas bar snang gi lha dang /
K12D0703_H0672:38b-23: mi'am ci la sogs pa la bsdigs pa /
K12D0703_H0672:38b-25: snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas //
K12D0703_H0672:38b-26: rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus //
K12D0703_H0672:38b-27: sde brgyad tshogs kyis nyes na chad pa'i las //
K12D0703_H0672:38b-28: grong khyer 'joms shing sde brgyad 'gum par bgyid //
K12D0703_H0672:38b-30: sde brgyad la tri sh'u la gdengs pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-2: dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-3: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-4: lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags bzang ris dang /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-5: mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can dang /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-6: grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-7: nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can la
K12D0703_H0672:39a-8: sogs pa 'khor mang po dang bcas pa dga' ba'i
K12D0703_H0672:39a-9: mdangs phyung ste sengge la rin po che'i rgyan phul
K12D0703_H0672:39a-10: lo // de nas sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i klu la bsdigs te /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-11: snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas //
K12D0703_H0672:39a-12: rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus //
K12D0703_H0672:39a-13: klu tshogs rnams kyis nyes na chad pa'i las /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-14: grong khyer 'joms shing klu rnams 'gum par bgyid //
K12D0703_H0672:39a-16: rgya mtsho chen po tri sh'u las dkrugs pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-17: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-18: klu'i rgyal po wa ra na dang /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-20: de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-22: lha dang lha ma yin gyi g-yul myong bar byed pa /
K12D0703_H0672:39a-23: klu'i rgyal po 'bum phrag drug g-yog dang 'khor du
K12D0703_H0672:39a-24: bcas pa 'dus te dga' ba'i mdangs phyung nas klu'i
K12D0703_H0672:39b-0: rgyal po wa ru na sbrul dkar @39b po gcig
K12D0703_H0672:39b-1: tu byas nas phyag 'tshal bskor ba lan gsum byas
K12D0703_H0672:39b-2: te / byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-3: khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-4: klu rnams kun gyi mgon mdzod cig /
K12D0703_H0672:39b-5: nyams na klu yi gshed ma mdzod //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-6: ces smras nas tri sh'u la la lan gsum dkris /
K12D0703_H0672:39b-7: kha byang chub sems dpa' la bsgyur //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-8: phu: phu: zhes brjod cing gus pas kha nas khrag 'byin cing gnas so //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-9: klu'i rgyal po gzhan rnams kyang thal mo sbyar nas bskor ba lan gsum gsum byas nas /
K12D0703_H0672:39b-10: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-11: khyod la bdag cag skyabs su mchi'o //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-12: klu rnams thams cad skyabs su zungs //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-13: nyams na klu yi gshed ma mdzod //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-14: ces smras nas klu chen po brgyad sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas tshangs skud la 'khris so //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-15: klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang bdag cag ni /
K12D0703_H0672:39b-17: ci bka' stsal pa nyan no //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-18: zhes smras nas klu rnams so so'i gnas su dengs so //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-20: byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
K12D0703_H0672:39b-22: snying nad sel ba zhes bya'o //
K12D0703_H0672:39b-24: de ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
K12D0703_H0672:39b-25: chen po de 'jam dpal smra ba'i sengge khyod nyid
K12D0703_H0672:40a-1: dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog de ni /
K12D0703_H0672:40a-2: da lta'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sengge
K12D0703_H0672:40a-3: sgra klu'i ded dpon chen po 'di nyid yin no
K12D0703_H0672:40a-5: ngas rgyal po chen po de'i don du thugs rje chen po'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
K12D0703_H0672:40a-7: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0703_H0672:40a-8: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0703_H0672:40a-11: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0703_H0672:40a-18: tsi ti dzva la ka ro ti birya sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:40a-20: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cus gsungs la /
K12D0703_H0672:40a-21: da ltar nga nyid kyis brjod pa'o //
K12D0703_H0672:40a-23: mi dgos pas las thams cad 'grub pa'o //
K12D0703_H0672:40a-24: bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sengge sgra'i sku lugs ma'am /
K12D0703_H0672:40a-25: bris sku'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa lam lhung
K12D0703_H0672:40a-26: bas so sor ma 'dres par mandal brgyad byas te
K12D0703_H0672:40a-27: / mandal re re la me tog tshom bu lnga lnga bkram ste me tog dang /
K12D0703_H0672:40a-31: phye ma rnams kyis mchod nas mandal re re la
K12D0703_H0672:40a-32: gzungs lan bcu gsum bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlas
K12D0703_H0672:40a-33: la lci ba de bsdus te /
K12D0703_H0672:40b-0: lci ba lhag ma la bsngags @40b shing nad pa la byugs na /
K12D0703_H0672:40b-1: nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0703_H0672:40b-2: lha dang klu la sogs pa'i dug gi nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0703_H0672:40b-3: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la grub par ma gyur na /
K12D0703_H0672:40b-5: thugs rje chen po nyid kyis mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa yin no //
K12D0703_H0672:40b-7: thugs rje chen po nyid kyis dam bcas pa'i tshig go /
K12D0703_H0672:40b-9: rgyal po chen po'i gnod pa ni /
K12D0703_H0672:40b-10: gzungs 'dis snying nad 'bar ba las grol nas skye
K12D0703_H0672:40b-11: ba phyi ma la bde ba can gyi zhing khams
K12D0703_H0672:40b-15: sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la sogs pa sangs rgyas
K12D0703_H0672:40b-16: bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus snying po 'di
K12D0703_H0672:40b-17: gsungs so // aom a'a: hr'i: sim ha n'a da h'um phat/
K12D0703_H0672:40b-18: da ltar nga nyid kyis brjod de /
K12D0703_H0672:40b-19: rig sngags kyi snying po 'di lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0703_H0672:40b-21: lus la mtshon gyis tshugs mi 'gyur //
K12D0703_H0672:40b-22: dgra dang chom pos mi tshugs cing //
K12D0703_H0672:40b-24: rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur //
K12D0703_H0672:40b-25: bud med lus su mi 'gyur zhing //
K12D0703_H0672:40b-26: rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur //
K12D0703_H0672:40b-27: shi nas bde ba can du 'gro //
K12D0703_H0672:41a-6: 'od srung gis kyang gsang sngags 'di gsungs la /
K12D0703_H0672:41a-7: da ltar sh'akya thub pa ngas kyang brjod pa ste /
K12D0703_H0672:41a-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0703_H0672:41a-9: na ma ha ya gri b'a ya /
K12D0703_H0672:41a-10: na mo lo ke shva r'a ya /
K12D0703_H0672:41a-12: aom hr'i: ku lu ku lu n'i la kantha /
K12D0703_H0672:41a-17: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
K12D0703_H0672:41a-19: badzra kro dha ha ya gri ba hr'i: h'um phat/
K12D0703_H0672:41a-21: gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid padma ha ya gri ba'i sngags yin te /
K12D0703_H0672:41a-22: lan gcig klog par byed pa'i mi //
K12D0703_H0672:41a-23: sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing //
K12D0703_H0672:41a-24: ngan song sgo rnams gcod par 'gyur //
K12D0703_H0672:41a-26: byad dang dug las grol 'gyur zhing //
K12D0703_H0672:41a-27: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yin no //
K12D0703_H0672:41a-28: bye ba grangs med mthu las byung //
K12D0703_H0672:41a-29: de yi yon tan dpag tu med //
K12D0703_H0672:41a-30: lan gcig bklags na sdig pa sel //
K12D0703_H0672:41a-31: lan gnyis bklags pas dpal dang ldan; ;gsum gyis tshe rnams ring bar 'gyur //
K12D0703_H0672:41b-1: khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-2: rlung dang grang ba las gyur pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-3: klu rgyal rigs kyis zin pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-4: klu bram ze'i rigs kyis zin pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-5: klu gdol pa dang dmangs rigs kyis zin pa ni /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-9: lto rgyab tu na ba dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-10: klad kor du na ba dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-11: gzhogs phyed du na ba dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-14: zha grum gyis btab pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-15: sbrum pa lta bur na ba dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-16: srog chags su na ba dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-17: tshigs dang sha khol bur na ba dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-20: rus khol du na ba dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-23: yi ga mi bde ba dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-24: thor pa lta bu'i nad dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-33: tsha tsag tsag la sogs pa'i mdze rigs can dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-34: phol mig dang bcas pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:41b-43: klu la sogs pas zin pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:42a-0: sha za'i gdon rnams kyis zin @42a *//
K12D0703_H0672:42a-3: de yang mi dge ba las sdug bsngal 'byung ba yin no //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0703_H0672:42a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal nyon cig /
K12D0703_H0672:42a-6: snying po gzungs kyi cho ga 'di //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-7: dang po thugs rje chen po la //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-8: gus shing dad pa'i sems bskyed nas //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-9: snum pa'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-10: lci ba drir bcas byugs nas ni //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-11: tshon rtsi kha dog sna lnga yis //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-13: bum pa gang ba lnga dag kyang //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-14: phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag /
K12D0703_H0672:42a-15: gang ba'i gtor ma lnga yang bshams //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-16: seng ldeng phur bu lnga yang dgod //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-17: dar gyis dkris pa'i mda' bzhi dgod //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-18: tshon skud lnga yi dra ba bre //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-19: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng+ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-20: khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-21: bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-22: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-23: byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po wa ru na la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-24: a'a: hr'i: hri pam tam nam/
K12D0703_H0672:42a-25: yi ge drug pa'i sngags 'di ni //
K12D0703_H0672:42a-26: brjod pas sdig pa sdug bsngal sel sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:42b-0: sangs rgyas @42b mchod la brtson par bya /
K12D0703_H0672:42b-4: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K12D0703_H0672:42b-10: rgyan thams cad kyis mchod nas /
K12D0703_H0672:42b-11: seng ldeng rgya shug me btang la //
K12D0703_H0672:42b-12: tshon skud bcang zhing 'bru rnams bsreg /
K12D0703_H0672:42b-13: rma bya rmag shad lcug ma yis //
K12D0703_H0672:42b-14: klu yi dug rnams sel bar byed //
K12D0703_H0672:42b-16: n'a ga dum ba le le /
K12D0703_H0672:42b-21: n'a ga khrol khrol shig shig sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:42b-23: log 'dren thams cad kyi yid kyi dug dang /
K12D0703_H0672:42b-28: dug thams cad phyir khud cig sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:42b-30: sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song zhig /
K12D0703_H0672:42b-34: zhi bar gyur cig sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:42b-37: de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o //
K12D0703_H0672:42b-40: rdo rje srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur //
K12D0703_H0672:42b-41: bkra shis lha mo dpal dang ldan //
K12D0703_H0672:42b-42: bsnyen gnas la ni gnas gyur nas //
K12D0703_H0672:42b-43: dkon mchog rjes dran sems bskyed nas //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-2: lus ngag sems kyis dag pa thob //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-3: pha rol phyin drug gnas gyur cing //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-4: sangs rgyas sems can mkhyen par gyur; ;ting 'dzin thams cad mngon du 'gyur //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-5: bu mo gzhon nus bkal pa yi //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-6: skud pa dkar po sum bsgril la //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-7: bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad byas nas //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-8: mgul du btags na nad las grol //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-9: nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-10: gzungs sngags bzlas shing btab gyur na //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-11: nad rnams kun las grol bar 'gyur //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-12: chu la gzungs sngags mang bzlas na //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-13: klu nad khong du sel bar 'gyur //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-14: lo tog za ba kha bcing na //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-15: bye ma sa dang thal bas sel //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-16: ha cang char pa ches pa na //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-17: lha la phul ba'i rnying pa la //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-18: kham phor gsar pa'i nang du yang //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-19: me tog gtsang ma blangs nas ni //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-21: ser ba drag po 'ongs pa na //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-22: thal che yungs kar bzlas brjod kyis //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-23: ser ba nya lcib lcug ma dang //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-24: lcum po btags te btsugs gyur na //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-26: lha klu dri za la sogs pa'i //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-27: gdon ni gnod par gyur pa la //
K12D0703_H0672:43a-29: bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-0: @43b sman sbyar chus ni gang ba la //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-1: bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-2: slob ma gos zas dkar po sbyar //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-3: dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhug /
K12D0703_H0672:43b-4: bum pa'i chu yis bkru bar bya //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-5: nad dang gnod pa kun las thar //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-6: klu sogs gdon rnams dpag med kyis //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-7: glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-8: bus pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa las //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-9: gi wang gis ni srung 'khor bri //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-10: yungs kar dag dang bcas te gdags //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-11: byis pa gdon dang nad las thar //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-12: lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-13: thu ba g-yas pa'i gos kyi grar //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-14: bzlas brjod bdun byas mdud pa bor //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-15: song na bde zhing don yang 'grub //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-16: rta la sogs pa'i phyug rnams la //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-17: chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-18: bzlas nas gtor na bde bar 'gyur //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-19: mi nad phyugs nad thams cad la //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-20: yungs kar dang ni bum pa'i chus //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-21: bkru zhing btags na mi nad zhi //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-22: aa mra ri yi gzungs sel ltar //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0703_H0672:43b-25: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal //
K12D0703_H0672:43b-26: rgyal po 'di'i khong na klu'i dug gis gang nas 'dug ste /
K12D0703_H0672:44a-0: klu'i rgyal po wa ru na 'dis klu thams cad la dbang @44a *//
K12D0703_H0672:44a-1: byed pa yin pas 'dis dbyung bar bya'o //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-2: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug sengge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-3: klu'i rgyal po wa ru na la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-4: klu'i rgyal po taksha ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-5: klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-6: klu'i rgyal po padma la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-7: klu'i rgyal po padma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-8: klu'i rgyal po dung skyong la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-9: klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-10: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-11: klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-12: aom wa ru n'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:44a-13: aom aa nant'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:44a-14: aom b'a su k'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:44a-15: aom taksha k'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:44a-16: aom karko t'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:44a-18: aom ma h'a padm'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:44a-19: aom sham kha p'a l'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:44a-20: aom ku li k'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:44a-21: klu yi gzugs ni mang po yang //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-22: dkar gsum mngar gsum 'bras zan la //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-23: legs byas kha dog bsgyur byas la //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-24: me tog spos dang byug pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:44a-25: mar me zhal zas sgra snyan dang //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-26: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan me tog phreng //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-27: tshangs pa'i skud pas mnyes par bya //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-28: rtsa ba lo ma sdong bu dang //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-29: me tog 'bras bu sman gyis mchod //
K12D0703_H0672:44a-30: rma bya gzungs mo me long gis //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-0: @44b rgyal po'i khong gi dug thon cig /
K12D0703_H0672:44b-1: rin chen rmag shad mchod pa'i rten //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-2: mi ldog pa yi rdzas su chongs //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-3: bum pa gter gyis gang ba mdzes //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-4: srog chags yid 'ong gzugs kyis mchod //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-6: klu yi rgyal po 'jog po yis //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-7: zin kyang skad cig gcig la thon //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-9: 'di gzhan gyi mthu ma yin te /
K12D0703_H0672:44b-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i mthu'o //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-13: thugs rje dang ldan pa 'di'i yon tan brjod kyis
K12D0703_H0672:44b-14: mi lang yang bdag gis cha shas tsam zhig brjod
K12D0703_H0672:44b-16: bya ba byas shing byed pa byas //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-17: khur bor bdag don rjes su brnyes //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-18: srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-19: yang dag bka' las rnam par grol //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-20: sems dpa' dbang sgyur thams cad kyi //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-21: mchog tu pha rol phyin thob pa //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-22: srid las rgal zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-24: a'a:/ gzhan la phan brtson thugs brtse can //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-25: sems can kun la mchog tu byams //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-26: khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig pu //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-27: mtha' yas sems can sgrol la mkhas //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-29: hr'i:/ 'gro ba nyam thag kun tu skyob //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-30: dri ma gsum spangs pha rol phyin //
K12D0703_H0672:44b-31: mngon shes drug brnyes n+ya gro bu //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-2: sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-3: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-4: sku mdog shel gyi kha dog 'dra //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-5: gangs ri nyi shar lta bur mtshon //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-7: rigs lnga sangs rgyas sku la 'phro //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-8: dbu skra thor tshugs gyen la bardzes //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-9: dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-10: klu rnams thams cad 'dul mdzad pa //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-11: rtse gsum sbrul gyis rab tu dkris //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-12: rigs gsum mgon po'i byin rlabs 'dzin //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-13: dug gsum rtsad nas gcod la bstod //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-14: skyon gyis ma gos padma bsnams //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-15: shes rab phun sum ral gri 'bar //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-16: nyon mongs dag pa bram ze'i mgo /
K12D0703_H0672:45a-17: me tog dri zhim tshogs kyis bkang //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-18: klu rnams kun nas dbang bsdus pas //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-19: sbrul gyi tshangs skud mdzes la bstod //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-21: padma dag gi gdan la bzhugs //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-22: bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon mdzad pa //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-23: sengge dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-24: 'dod pa'i don rnams sgrub pa'i phyir //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-25: rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-26: ba spu nya ga ma re re yang //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-27: sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-28: phyag 'tshal thugs rje can la bstod //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-30: dam chos rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-31: lha mo sgrol ma rjes su 'brang //
K12D0703_H0672:45a-32: 'jigs pa brgyad skyob sku mdog ljang //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-0: gnod @45b pa sel ba mi 'jigs sbyin //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-1: autpal thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-2: btud de sprul pa mang po 'gyed //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-4: h'um/ gos dkar mo ni bka' bzhin byed //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-5: yid bzhin 'khor lo bde bar bskor //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-6: 'dod pa'i don yod sdug bsngal zhi //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-7: 'jigs pa brgyad po sel ba la bstod //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-9: phat/ ha ya gri ba khro bo'i sku //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-11: kro dha mgrin sngon gdug pa 'dul //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-12: klu bdud 'dul mdzad h'um gis bstod //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-14: nam mkha' klu rgyal wa ru na //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-15: chu lha ston pa'i zhal mthong zhing //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-16: bstan la rab dga' klu rnams 'dul //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-17: sa dang po yi bden pa mthong //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-18: bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-19: klu rgyal byang chub sems la bstod //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-20: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:45b-21: aom ka te bi ka te ni ka te /
K12D0703_H0672:45b-22: ka tam ka ra sv'a h'a /
K12D0703_H0672:45b-23: gang gis bstod cing zlos pa de mtshams med pa
K12D0703_H0672:45b-24: lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su
K12D0703_H0672:45b-26: dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-27: gsang sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-28: bskal pa stong gi bar du ngan song du mi skye'o //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-29: bud med kyi lus su mi skye'o //
K12D0703_H0672:45b-30: su zhig nang par langs nas chu dri zhim pos
K12D0703_H0672:46a-0: khrus byas te gtsang sbra la gnas nas thugs @46a
K12D0703_H0672:46a-1: *// rje chen po sengge sgra'i spyan sngar gzungs 'di klog gam /
K12D0703_H0672:46a-5: kha ton du bton nas snying po dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46a-21: byad kyi dkyil 'khor la nad sna tshogs 'dus pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46a-24: rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0703_H0672:46a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K12D0703_H0672:46a-28: su zhig gam rgyal po chen po des gzungs 'di glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46a-30: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46a-37: rgyal po yul 'khor dang bcas pa'am /
K12D0703_H0672:46a-38: gtsug lag khang du glegs bam 'di 'chang na /
K12D0703_H0672:46a-39: dpal nag po chen po dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46a-40: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46b-0: klu'i rgyal po wa ru @46b na dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46b-1: klu chen po brgyad rnams slad bzhin 'brang zhing dpag tshad stong tshun chad du slar rgol ba dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46b-5: gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46b-7: phyir rgol ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K12D0703_H0672:46b-13: nyan pa nor ba yang gzungs 'di bklags pas dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0703_H0672:46b-14: gzungs 'dis su la srung ba byas pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46b-15: yongs su bskyab pa byas pa dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46b-18: bde legs su byas pa de la mtshon dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46b-25: dus ma yin par 'chi bas mi tshugs so //
K12D0703_H0672:46b-26: gnod par byed pa tshar gcod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0703_H0672:46b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46b-28: nyan thos chen po sh'a ra dva ti'i bu dang /
K12D0703_H0672:46b-32: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom
K12D0703_H0672:46b-33: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do
K12D0703_H0672:46b-34: // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sengge sgra zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12D0703_H0672:47a-0: @47a *// kha che'i yul dur khrod 'bri sa ka rang byung
K12D0703_H0672:47a-1: gi mchod rten rtsar dngos grub brnyes pa'i rje btsun
K12D0703_H0672:47a-2: ma rdo rje sems ma dang /
K12D0703_H0672:47a-3: sgra sgyur gyi lotstsha ba mgar shes rab 'byung gnas
